"styles" : "@media (max-width:47.99em) { #uef-header-lg, #uef-nav-lg { display: none; } #uef-header-sm { display: flex; } } @media (min-width:48em) { #uef-header-lg {display: flex;} #uef-nav-lg {display: flex;} #uef-header-sm {display: none;} }"

"styles" : "@media (max-width:59.99em) { #uef-header-lg, #uef-nav-lg { display: none; } #uef-header-sm { display: flex; } } @media (min-width:60em) { #uef-header-lg {display: flex;} #uef-nav-lg {display: block;} #uef-header-sm {display: none;} }"
